titles: An elegy on that worthy and famous actor, Mr. Charles Hart, who departed this life Thursday August the 18th. 1683.
publisher: Printed by Nath. Thompson, at the entrance into the Old-Spring-Garden near Charing-Cross,
notes: Verse: "CAn Hart be dead, and yet neglected lie ..."
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Hart, Charles, d. 1683 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
